name: Super_Jump
display_help: While this power is active, you can leap great distances and heights, easily jumping over buildings and from rooftop to rooftop! If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be reduced to a normal jump height. You must be at least level 14 and have Jump Kick or Combat Jumping before selecting Super Jump.

name: Hasten
display_help: You can reduce the recharge time of all powers for 2 minutes. Although Hasten does not cost any Endurance to activate, you can tire easily since your Endurance does not recover more rapidly. After Hasten wears off, you become tired and will lose some Endurance.
display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} has increased your rate of attack.

messages.display_victim_hit: Your {PowerName} drains {Damage} points of endurance.

name: Super_Speed
display_help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

name: Whirlwind
display_help: You spin around at an amazing speed to create a Whirlwind around yourself. Any foes that enter this Whirlwind will be tossed into the air. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Speed Powers before selecting Whirlwind.
display_attacker_hit: You spin into a {PowerName}, and can now toss your foes in the air like the garbage they are.

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
Your {PowerName} drains {Damage} points of endurance.

name: Recall_Friend
display_help: You can Teleport one of your teammates to yourself. The target must be a teammate and can be selected from the Team Window. You can also rescue a fallen teammate who may be in a hostile location, as long as he is on the same map. Range is not infinite, but extremely long and can be enhanced. This power can be interrupted.
display_confirm: {PlayerSource} would like to Teleport you. Do you Accept?

name: Teleport_Foe
display_help: You can Teleport a single foe directly next to yourself. A successful hit must be made in order to Teleport the target, and some powerful foes cannot be Teleported. This power can be interrupted.

name: Teleport
display_help: You can Teleport long distances. Teleport has no recharge time, and can be reactivated without pause, as long as you have Endurance. You must be at least level 14 and have Recall Friend or Teleport Foe before selecting Teleport.

name: Team_Teleport
display_help: You can Teleport yourself and your nearby teammates to a targeted location. Teammates must be in close proximity to you. Team Teleport costs slightly more Endurance than Teleport, but you can Teleport your entire team for no additional cost. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Teleportation Powers before selecting Team Teleport.
